explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes an innovative approach integrating contrastive learning and GANs, which are machine learning techniques.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The method involves training a Transformer-based autoencoder to capture normal point distributions, which is typically an unsupervised learning task.
explanations.deep learning: The paper mentions the use of deep learning techniques like GANs and Transformers in financial risk assessment.
explanations.neural network: GANs and Transformers are types of neural networks used in the proposed method.
explanations.representation learning: The paper involves learning representations of normal point distributions using a Transformer-based autoencoder.
explanations.autoencoder: The method includes training a Transformer-based autoencoder to capture normal point distributions.
explanations.Generative Adversarial Networks: The paper explicitly mentions the use of GANs in the proposed approach.
explanations.Transformer: The method uses a Transformer-based autoencoder as part of the GAN framework.
explanations.attention mechanism: Transformers utilize attention mechanisms, which are implicitly part of the proposed method.
